content:
I am currently a research fellow at Institute of Construction and Environmental Engineering (ICEE). I finished my MEng in SPatial INformatics Group at Seoul National University, advised by Yongil Kim and Kiyun Yu. I got my BE in architectural engineering at Seoul National Univeristy in South Korea.
As an early startup team member, I am also participating in UITI [ ✉️] based on LBS business in Korea. I engaged in launching 집현전 [Wise Strategy to Buy a House], the web service that recommends real estate and links customers to the agents. Besides, by proposing a business item recommending commercial district to new business owners, I won a government fund worth $50000 in my sole name. For do that, I’ve been working on a minimum value product with the team I’ve hired.
I plan to be an incoming student for the doctoral program in CEE at Georgia Tech from 2021 Spring.
summary: I am currently a research fellow at Institute of Construction and Environmental Engineering (ICEE). I finished my MEng in SPatial INformatics Group at Seoul National University, advised by Yongil Kim and Kiyun Yu.
title: Seongyong Kim
Deep Floor Plan Analysis for Complicated Drawings Based on Style Transfer (currently typesetting in CPENG)

content:
[Jan. 2021] I will start the doctoral program in CEE at Georgia Tech from Spring semester.
[Nov. 2020] The launch date of 집현전 [Wise Strategy to Buy a House], the Korean web service I’ve partially engaged in. This service is to recommend real estate to customers and to connect them to real estate agents with low broker fees.
[Aug. 2020] Our paper Deep Floor Plan Analysis for Complicated Drawings Based on Style Transfer was finally accepted at ASCE Journal of Computing in Civil Engineering.
[Jun. 2020] I won a fund worth $50000 from Startup Supporting Program by Korea Ministry of SMEs and Startups.
title: News
